thread.title: Russian journalists brawl on air over Stalin's legacy

title: Russian journalists brawl on air over Stalin's legacy
text:
Russian journalists brawl on air over Stalin's legacy Thursday, February 01, 2018 - 00:50 
Two Russian journalists came to blows while broadcasting live on a Moscow radio station over Josef Stalin's role in World War Two, days after the comedy film, ''The Death of Stalin'' was banned in the country. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Two Russian journalists came to blows while broadcasting live on a Moscow radio station over Josef Stalin's role in World War Two, days after the comedy film, "The Death of Stalin" was banned in the country. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2nBW62n
